mapper.select: /* 공고목록조회 */ SELECT mn.member_id AS memberId, mn.mentoring_notice_code AS noticeCode, mn.mentoring_notice_title AS noticeTitle, mn.mentoring_mentor_PSBLTY_start_YMD AS noticeStartYmd, mn.mentoring_mentor_PSBLTY_end_YMD AS noticeEndYmd, mn.mentor_notice_REG_YMD AS noticeRegYmd FROM mentoring_notice mn;
